https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3cHWJXV59dhY1t8Ls0kw3TTBjVl.jpg Kathir, a jobless youngster, relentlessly pursues Anitha with his love. Anitha's feelings slowly change from contempt to love, but she does not want to reveal it until Kathir discovers his true self. 7G Rainbow Colony
